pages.text: 37|127|geudeul-eun geuege geoyeoghayeoss-eu ni geudeul-eun bunmyeong bulliwo gass-eulila
37|128|geuleona seongsilhan hananim-ui jongdeul-eun geuleohji anihaessnola
37|129|hananim-eun geuege chugbog-eul naelyeo hue ol sedaedeul-ui gieogsog-e nam ge hayeossnola
37|130|illiyaseuwa gat-eun ideul-ege pyeong-an-i iss-eul geos-ila
37|131|ileohdeus hananim-eun seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-ege bosang-eul bepunila
37|132|sillo geuneun mid-eum-i ganghan ha nanim-ui jong jung-ui han jong-ieossnola
37|133|losdo hananim-i bonaen seonji ja jung han seonjijalo
37|134|hananim-eun geuwa geuligo geuuichujongja moduleul guhayeossnola
37|135|geuleona dwie nam-eun han neulg-eun yeoseong-eun je-oedoeeossnola
37|136|geuhu hananim-eun nameojido myeolmangke haessnani
37|137|sillo neohuiga achim-i doemae geudeul-ui sajeogjileul jinagassnola
37|138|jeonyeog-edo geuleohageoneul neohuineun ihaehaji moshaneunyo
37|139|yonado hananim-i bonaen seon jija jung han seonjijalo
37|140|geuneun han noyecheoleom gadeug sil-eun baelo dojuhayeo
37|141|jeomsul-eul deonjyeoss-euni geuga binan-eul bad-assdeola
37|142|geuttae keun gogiga geuleul samkyeo beolyeoss-euni ineun geuui binanbad-eul haeng wi ttaemun-ieossnola
37|143|hananimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo lago geuga hoegaehaji anihaessdamyeon
37|144|geuneun bunmyeong geu mulgogi baes-sog e buhwal-ui geunalkkaji iss-eoss-eulila
37|145|hananim-i geuleul bulmoui haebyeon-eulo gujehani geuneun byeongdeul-eo iss-eoss deola
37|146|hananim-eun jolongbag namuga geu ui wilo jalage hayeossnola
37|147|hananim-i sibmanmyeong isang-ui baeg seongdeul-ege geuleul bonaessdeoni
37|148|geudeul-i mid-eum-eul gagyeossdeola geulihayeo hananim-eun geudeul-ege jamsidong-an geudeul-ui salm-eul jeulgidolog heolaghayeossnola
37|149|geudaeui junim-egeneun ttaldeulman issgo geudeul-egeneun adeulman issneunji mul-eobola
37|150|animyeon hananim-i cheonsaleul yeo seong-eulo changjohan geos-eul geudeul-i moggyeog ilado haessneunyo
37|151|sillo geudeul-i malhaneun geos-eun kkumyeonaen geos-e bulgwahanila
37|152|hananimkkeseo jason-eul nahneunda hani geudeul-eun geojishaneun jadeul-ila
37|153|hananimkkeseo adeulboda ttaldeul eul seontaeghaessdan mal-inyo
